name: Caledonian Sleeper, First Class, London to Inverness
description:
Check out my Europe by Train Bright Trip guide: https://www.brighttrip.com/europebytrain

Date of Travel: 01 FEB 2017
TOC: Caledonian Sleeper
Consist: Class 90/Class 67 locomotive + 16 MkII/MkIII carriages
Livery: Old CS livery
Route: EUS-INV
Travel Time: 13h03m
Miles: 567
Remarks: None


Thanks for finding my video and pressing play! 

Join me as I take the Caledonian Sleeper - one of Britain's oldest trains - between London Euston and Inverness in the Scottish Highlands. Featuring a detailed walkaround of the sleeper berth, lounge car, dinner, breakfast and all the quirks of the journey in between.

Everything you need to know about the present sleeper, its past, and the exciting plans for the future is here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Caledonian_Sleeper

MY MOST-WATCHED VIDEO - BRITISH AIRWAYS FIRST CLASS 787 REPORT: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4LRFy...
